meanings.definition: A type of narrative poem or tale dealing with chivalry and adventure.
meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed reading a thrilling rom about knights and dragons.
meanings.sent2: The library had a whole section dedicated to classic roms.
meanings.sent3: The teacher told a funny rom about a clumsy knight to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was like a magical rom that transported us to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The vivid imagery in the rom made it feel like we were part of the adventure.

meanings.definition: A novel or other prose narrative depicting heroic or marvelous deeds, pageantry, romantic exploits, etc.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore displayed a new rom that everyone was talking about.
meanings.sent2: She loved reading roms that had strong, brave heroes.
meanings.sent3: The rom she was reading had a surprising plot twist that kept her engaged.
meanings.sent4: His life felt like a never-ending rom filled with challenges and triumphs.
meanings.sent5: The rom's romantic elements added depth to the characters and their relationships.

meanings.definition: A style of design or architecture characteristic of the Romantic Movement.
meanings.sent1: The museum showcased beautiful paintings inspired by the rom style.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite building in the city had intricate rom details on its facade.
meanings.sent3: The rom-inspired garden was a peaceful retreat for visitors.
meanings.sent4: The rom architecture of the castle made it look like a fairy tale come to life.
meanings.sent5: The rom elements in the design created a sense of nostalgia and beauty.
